channel.title: Civ 5
channel.description:
Looking to create a fairly large civ5 game (preferably with the g&k expansion pack). The amount of people who are playing will affect whether we use the AI or not, but I'd much rather have an all player game over a mixed match up.
If you've got no idea what Civ5 is: http://store.steampowered.com/app/8930/ It's currently on sale with 75% off, so it's well worth the cash. Currently playing:
Tom Albi Classic Speed
We can really play any time, but we're looking to have a game tonight at ~1AM GMT. We'd preferable be using some sort of voice communication, which right now is Skype (Add me: tombeta5001, or Albi: rsfreeworld).

item.title: Civ 5
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I’ll pick it up tomorrow but I’m still very preoccupied with ship simulator extreme.

Read full topic

item.title: Civ 5
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Si Force:

Are you guys still playing around with this? It seems that there’s 50% off Civ 5 now, but that’s still quite good. Also, where to get expansion pack?

Yeah, we play quite a lot (Usually everyday). You can also get the expansion on steam too:

The expansion unlocks an array of new civs, and introduces new resources, and things such as religion into the game.

Bowser jr:

Do it have to be a legally bought copy of the game?

Never really looked into this, but as long as you can play the game with other bought versions then it’s fine. I’ve never downloaded any other version that has been cracked etc.

Read full topic

item.title: Civ 5
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Bowser jr:

I would love to, but I’m too late and suck in CIV5 and English.

If you’re interested in playing anytime, just either use the IRC/PM/Skype. We play quite frequently. The range of skill level in the game ranges quite a bit, Speed literally bought the game today.
